Name: Vacation Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass. Then POUR liqueur into the centre of the drink. It should sink to create a blue base and leave a blue spot in the centre of this drink's frothy head.
Review: A great-looking holiday (Tiki-style) cocktail with vanilla, coconut and pineapple.
History: My 2003 adaptation of the then signature drink at the MercBar on Mercer Steet in Soho, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Vacation Martini contains 148 calories
